tripleplay.shaders

Class RotateYShader

  • java.lang.Object
    • playn.core.gl.GLShader
      • playn.core.gl.IndexedTrisShader
        • tripleplay.shaders.RotateYShader

  • public class RotateYShader
extends IndexedTrisShader
    Rotates the view through a 3D transform around the Y axis. Can be used to simulate a (rigid) page turn.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class playn.core.gl.GLShader

        GLShader.Attrib, GLShader.Uniform1f, GLShader.Uniform1i, GLShader.Uniform2f, GLShader.Uniform2fv, GLShader.Uniform2i, GLShader.Uniform3f, GLShader.Uniform4f, GLShader.Uniform4fv, GLShader.UniformMatrix4fv

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      float angle
      The angle of rotation.
      float eyeX
      The x-coordinate of the eye (as a fraction of the screen width).
      float eyeY
      The y-coordinate of the eye (as a fraction of the screen height).
      float zScale
      The multiple of the screen width by which to scale z (usually either 1 or 0.5).

      • Fields inherited from class playn.core.gl.IndexedTrisShader

        PER_VERT_ATTRS, VERT_ATTRS, VERT_SETCOLOR, VERT_SETPOS, VERT_SETTEX, VERT_UNIFS, VERT_VARS, VERTEX_SHADER
